line_1: Or playsant Rhime on yonder Mice:
line_2: Come frame Us now some clean Device,

line_1: The Cockle, spiral Whirle, and hardy Mice,
line_2: With Wilks of various Shell, and quaint Device.

line_1: Close in the Trap confines th' unwary Mice,
line_2: As when the falling Lid with quick Surprize

line_1: And turn its Fury on the crafty Mice.
line_2: But wage the rising War by deep Device,
